title: caraNa pankajam
sahitya:
caraNa pankajam aladu tuNaiyilai sarva jagadhIshvaranE unadu


anupallavi

  karuNai mAkaDal enru nambi kai tozhum enaik-kAttaruL unadu


caraNam    janana maraNa vem shuzhalil uzhalum jantu kOTigaLil orAi azhindEn
manadil mUvaashaip-pEigaL ADa matiyizhandu paritavikkum enakku unadu
